summary: MY 2010 TOYATA PRIUS (PURCHASED IN SEPT. 2009) HAS HAD REPEATED PROBLEMS WHILE BRAKING OVER A PATCH OF ROAD WITH SMALL POTHOLES.  IF THE BRAKES ARE ENGAGED WHILE OVER THE PATCH OF UNEVEN ROAD, THE CAR LURCHES OR "JUMPS" OVER THE SPOT ON THE ROAD AND THE BRAKES DON'T BEGIN TO CATCH UNTIL THE CAR GETS OVER THE PATCH.  THIS HAS HAPPENED 5-10 TIME OVER THE LAST FOUR MONTHS AT A STOP LIGHT. *JB
